#summary Instructions to configure Linux to run Android Notifier Desktop at login

= Introduction =

If you saw a dialog box saying "Please, use your system startup manager to start me at login" and wondered how to do that, then this guide is for you.

== Gnome Desktop ==

Go to _System -> Preferences -> Startup Programs_ *or* _System -> Preferences -> Sessions -> Startup Programs_ tab

Click _Add_ and type "/usr/share/android-notifier-desktop/run.sh" on _Command_ text box, type whatever makes sense for you in the other ones. Or drag-and-drop _Applications -> Accessories -> Android Notifier Desktop_ to the _Startup Applications_ window.
